definitions.definition: Condensed water falling from a cloud .
examples: We've been having a lot of rain lately.
The rains came late that year.

definitions.definition: Any matter moving or falling, usually through air, and especially if liquid or otherwise figuratively identifiable with raindrops .
An instance of particles or larger pieces of matter moving or falling through air .
examples: A rain of mortar fire fell on our trenches.

main_definition: ( meteorology ) Condensed water falling from a cloud .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) Any matter moving or falling, usually through air, and especially if liquid or otherwise figuratively identifiable with raindrops .
( figuratively ) An instance of particles or larger pieces of matter moving or falling through air .
